meta.title: Jakub Budzich - Frontend Developer
meta.description: Jakub Budzich's website - computer science student and junior frontend developer. Projects in Vue.js, React, Angular.

hero.name: Jakub Budzich
hero.description: I create modern and responsive web applications using the latest technologies.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I am a 4th-year computer science student at UWM Olsztyn. After completing my bachelor's degree, I plan to continue my studies to obtain a master's degree in computer science.
about.paragraph2: I don't have professional work experience yet. All my knowledge and skills come from university courses and personal projects that can be found on my GitHub profile.
about.paragraph3: I am always open to new challenges and eager to take on ambitious projects, primarily as a frontend developer, but I'm ready to learn in other areas of programming.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Contact Information
contact.description: If you're interested in collaboration or have any questions, don't hesitate to contact me.
